name: Sausage Runner
description:
You participate in the kitchen races! In this race you do not need to become a hot dog or a grilled sausage. To prevent this from happening, you overcome the obstacle in the form of knives and grill pans. Someone will just say run a sausage, but that's not enough, you need to fly so that you are not served as a hot dog. On the run you can collect coins and then for coins you can become, for example, a running bacon. Okay enough to talk about the game it's time to tell the sausage run and send it to the kitchen!

A running sausage is not very cool, but we need to write about the features of the game:
1. The peculiarity is that the sausage is running!
2. And there are knives and fire there, just like a game of fire!
3. If you scream at a smartphone sausage run, then ... there will be a super mega nothing!)))
